column4: why is it that my Sempron Thoroughbred @2Ghz 1Gb of DDR400 geforce 6200 AGP so much quicker running ubuntu studio  8.10 then this atholon x2 4000+ 1Gb ddr2 667 geforce 6150se running 9.04 regular ubuntu?
are you sure you are running ubuntu x64?
yes, but why would running x64 on  it make it so much slower? I do intend to up it to 4Gb though
it won't make it run slower, only faster
